pullRequest.title: Migrate pxf-s3 to Spring Boot
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update top level build.gradle to include pxf-s3
Add new build.gradle for pxf-s3
all existing unit tests should be ported to junit 5

commit.message:
Migrate pxf-s3 to Spring Boot

- Update top level build.gradle to include pxf-s3
- Add new build.gradle for pxf-s3
- all existing unit tests should be ported to junit 5

nodes.bodyText: why do we want to do this now ? by this point we already read all data and just failed to close the stream, this is usually ignored as the stream itself will be GC-ed in a short while and the caller does not get any impact from this error ?
